com.psddev.cms.db

Class Content

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.db.Record
      • com.psddev.cms.db.Content
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.psddev.dari.db.Recordable, com.psddev.dari.util.HtmlObject, BeanInfo, Cloneable, Comparable<com.psddev.dari.db.Record>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Draft, ExternalContent, Grid, Page, ReferenceableContent, Section, Text

    @Content.Searchable
public abstract class Content
extends com.psddev.dari.db.Record
    Represents a generic content.
